General_Description: '''Bleeding Blue''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta|Our]] nation is full of those [[Athens|blue vermin]]. Get rid of them."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and killed Athenian [[Marksman|marksmen]] and [[Nation Leader|leaders]], as well as sank some Athenian [[ship]]s throughout [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
